document.full_text: alexi ogando pitched 7 1/3 innings to remain unbeaten and the texas rangers avoided a sweep by detroit with a 7-3 victory over the tigers.
document.title: ogando pitches rangers past tigers, stays unbeaten
lines_and_colors: alexi ogando pitched 7 1/3 innings to remain unbeaten and the texas rangers avoided a sweep by detroit with a 7-3 victory over the tigers.
